characterDescription:
The quartermaster in Kholinar is in charge of the royal emerald reserve.
He tells Kaladin that the emeralds there are held for emergency grain. He also says that he doesn't know how Kaladin talked their highprince into taking them. Kaladin replies that he's only borrowing them, but that some of them will be dun when they're returned.
The quartermaster tells him that he could buy a princedom for that much. Then, he asks Kaladin what in Kelek's name he needs them for.
Sigzil then guessed that they were going to practice being Radiant.
